titles.title: A resolution providing for the printing of a history of the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries in connection with the 100th anniversary of the committee.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Procurement and Printing.

bill.summary: 12/21/1987--Introduced. Requires a brief history of the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries to be printed as a House document in connection with the 100th anniversary of the committee.
